oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Mr. Jack Norris, father of Captain A.D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter reports the writer's visit to Wilson County. There he visited with Mr. Lige Kenedy who belonged to the same 7th TN Inf. Regt., CSA as did Mr. Norris' son, Capt. A.D. Norris. On this visit, author saw a letter written to Capt. Phillips from; Capt. Norris where he gave a list of the killed and wounded saying none were from Rome, Tenn. and that "Mr. Anderson and some other of Lebanon were killed." Author concludes by saying he felt it was his duty to let A.D. Norris' family know the news.
